body.text: 's official home page! We are the home of the most delectable Filipino cuisine in town. This restaurant is home to Chef Matteo Veterano's rendition of classic Filipino cuisine, from warm and comforting
as your main course, to cool, indulgent
for dessert. We craft our dishes with passion and reverence for their culture of origin. This website contains everything, and I really mean

about this wonderful establishment. See our menu, read testimonials, and reach out to us for reservations and any other questions you may have. We invite you to journey through the flavors of the Philippines, all from the heart of our community. Come, and savor the experience!

first opened its doors in 2004. Chef Matteo Veterano was truly a veteran of the kitchen, having worked for various Michelin Star awardee restaurants from around the globe. He opened this fine establishment as he wished to share his mother's recipes to diners and guests from all over.
, we forgo any fancy and pretentious vibes. We believe that the spirit of Filipino food is in the passion that comes into crafting each meal.

testimonials.comment: I wasn't sure what was in store for me going into this restaurant, but 'pleasantly surprised' is a MASSIVE understatement. Every single dish looks home-style but the quality is truly divine and out of this world!

I've eaten here countless times but last week I was finally able to fly out my dad from Texas and eat here for his birthday. To Chef Matteo, BRAVO. [...] My dad was instantly reminded of his lola's cooking from when he was a kid.
yeah this restaurant sure is tasty
